configuration_schema.description: Configuration model information of section group.

section-group.description: The configuration information of section group, depend zxr10-section.

group-id.description: Configure ID of section group.The group ID is between [1,x].The value of x depends on the performance parameters,it's default value is 64.

east-section.description: Configure east section of wrapping protection.

west-section.description: Configure west section of wrapping protection.

cross-device.description: Ring cross node device configuration of ring cross protection.

cross-group-id.description: Section group ID of ring cross node device in crossed ring.The group ID is between [1,x].The value of x depends on the performance parameters,it's default value is 64.

master-aps-id.description: APS ID of master ring cross node device.

slave-aps-id.description: APS ID of slave ring cross node device.

non-cross-device.description: Non cross node device configuration of ring cross protection.

master-aps-id.description: APS ID of master ring cross node device.

slave-aps-id.description: APS ID of slave ring cross node device.

section-group-state.description: Query section group status information, the group ID is between [1,x].The value of x depends on the performance parameters,it's default value is 64.Support queries without conditions and at protection group ID query.
